description: Detects when language in cultural movements or group identity begins to blur, inflate, or emotionally manipulate meaning—making honest discourse difficult.

variables.T(t): Terminological inflation (words that mean too much or too little)
variables.H(t): Historical or contextual grounding of terms

response: If everyone’s saying it but no one can define it—pause. Truth needs friction. Let’s ground this word in something real again.
